uientry.s: function UpdateSlider() local value = Component.GetProperty("Parent.Value") - Component.GetProperty("stepSize") Component.SetProperty("Parent.Value", value) Component.Call("Parent.LuaCall", "Update") end

function UpdateSlider() local value = Component.GetProperty("Parent.Value") + Component.GetProperty("stepSize") Component.SetProperty("Parent.Value", value) Component.Call("Parent.LuaCall", "Update") end
